swiper.title: We deliver water in less than
swiper.texts: Fast delivery is a priority in our company, which is why we deliver water in less than 24 hours from the time of order. If our team fails to deliver water within the specified time, one capsule of water is provided for free.

swiperCustomer.title: Rakhimjon Ermatov
swiperCustomer.texts: Hot promotion for hot days! Buy 8 water capsules for only 130,000 UZS. Hurry up, the promotion period is limited. When you buy the first three capsules, we will give you a mechanical pump as a gift. Buy coolers at the best price and get 10 water capsules as a gift.

about.text: Drinking water of the highest quality
about.texts: LLC 'Waterzone Group', established in 2012 under the brand Woda, extracts mineral water from the artesian well n 5559(14) located in the Yukorichirchik district of the Tashkent region.
about.texts2: To make water not only clean but also healthy, we use an eight-stage water purification process followed by the addition of minerals.
about.text2: We have already been chosen by
about.text3: Thousands of people live without love, but no one without water.

sale.texts2: Placing your first order with us? In that case, we have a special offer just for you. Order 5 water capsules and get 2 additional water capsules for free. This offer is valid only for the first order.
sale.texts3: Hot promotion for hot days! Buy 8 water capsules for only 130 thousand sum. Hurry, the promotion period is limited.
sale.texts4: Buy coolers at the best price and get 10 water capsules as a gift.
sale.texts5: When buying the first three capsules, we give you a mechanical pump as a gift.
sale.texts6: Since May 1, prices for many products have increased. However, our prices have remained the same.
sale.text6: More than 50% of the human body is made up of water.

clients.text2: Water is the only suitable drink for the wise.

contacts.texts2: The request is received via call or Telegram
contacts.texts3: The request is added to the general delivery table
contacts.texts4: Our courier delivers the water within 24 hours
contacts.texts5: Upon receiving the capsule, you pay by card or cash
contacts.texts6: Our operators will contact you shortly
contacts.texts8: Do you have questions or suggestions?
contacts.texts9: Contact us if you have any questions or want to get additional information
